item.title: Ultimate List of Resources for Learning Korean in 2019

item.description: This content is being revamped into its own website! Please hang tight for now!

item.title: Korean for Programmers
item.author: zah@andrewzah.com (Andrew Zah)
item.description: I was inspired to write this after reading German for Programmers.\{\{cite(n=0)}} It’s quite likely that I’m just biased to see things a certain way because I work with programming languages for a living, but I often find myself drawing comparisons among Korean and programming.

item.title: Korean Food & Cooking Vocabulary Reference
item.author: zah@andrewzah.com (Andrew Zah)
item.description: Here is a compiled list of Korean words related to food, cooking, eating (out), going out, and nutrition.
